Categories.edit.description: Optimize content management on your news portal. Easily structure and customize news categories, achieving an orderly presentation and smooth access to information. Simplify content management, significantly improving the usability of your portal to provide a more enjoyable and focused reading experience.

Plan.new.product.modal.description: Select a product to add to the plan configuration. Then, choose one or more categories that you want to associate with this product. Make sure to complete both steps to properly customize your plan.
Plan.new.category.modal.description: The categories you choose have specific settings for accessing content. You can set a limited amount or allow unlimited access. In addition, a duration is determined and the access frequency is daily. Make sure to adjust these options according to your preferences before confirming.
Plan.new.rate.description: Optimize your experience on the news portal by customizing the duration of your plan and choosing the rate that best suits your needs.
Plan.new.product.description: Specify the subscription category to the content, the number of accesses and the desired viewing duration.
PaymentMethods.config.description: Configure for your site the payment options offered by Loyalty Wall
PaymentMethods.config.title: Configure payment methods
PaymentMethods.evertec.description: Evertec as a payment method is a smart decision due to its solid track record of processing secure and reliable payments in Latin America and the Caribbean. It also offers a wide variety of payment options, making it easy to adapt to your customers' preferences
PaymentMethods.evertec.modal.description: Enter your Evertec credentials to configure your account.
PaymentMethods.evertec.modal.title: Evertec Credentials
Plan.form.name: Plan name
Plan.newPlan.description: This function allows you to create a new custom plan, adapted to your needs. Define key characteristics, such as duration, access to specific categories, and any other important details to provide your users with a unique and appropriate experience. Configure the options according to your goals and preferences, and create a plan that stands out and meets your audience's expectations.
PaymentMethods.history.description: Access and review your transaction history easily and conveniently. It allows you to track and consult all previous purchases and payments, giving you a complete record of your financial activities. Thus, you will have total control over your transactions and a useful record to manage your finances more effectively.
PaymentMethods.history.info: To access this option you must first configure a payment method for your site.
PaymentMethods.history.title: Transaction history
PaymentMethods.paypal.description: PayPal is an excellent choice as a payment method due to its robust security and wide acceptance online. It also offers users the flexibility to link multiple funding sources, such as credit cards and bank accounts, for a hassle-free shopping experience.
PaymentMethods.paypal.modal.description: Enter your PayPal credentials to configure your account.
PaymentMethods.paypal.modal.title: PayPal Credentials
PaymentMethods.title: Payment Methods

Plan.view.configuration.description: Customize your plan according to your preferences by selecting the products that suit your content consumption. In addition, specify the subscription category to the content, the number of accesses and the desired viewing duration for a completely tailored experience for your users.
Plan.view.detail.description: Users with basic access, you will be able to discover outstanding content without complications. Stay informed quickly and easily as an anonymous user, without the need to commit to a registration.
Plan.view.state.description: The 'state' refers to the condition that determines the visibility of the plan. By activating the option, the plan becomes visible, while by deactivating it, it is blocked and cannot be viewed.
Plan.view.title: View Plan

Products.allProducts.description: The action of 'All products' in 'True' implies that the product will cover all the sections or themes that a newspaper offers to its readers and can only be used in a single product.
Products.announcement.create: The products represent the various sections or topics that a newspaper offers to its readers, and must be created exactly as specified on the site.
Products.announcement.edit: Products represent the various sections or themes that a newspaper offers its readers, and must be created exactly as specified on the site. If you want to generate a product that encompasses all sections, create it with the name 'Entire site'.
